website_summaries.verdict: A heated toilet seat that comes with a soft blue light for when you have to go at night.
pros: Nightlight turns on and off with a button
cons: Like other heated toilet seats, this seat requires a nearby GFI outlet for operation

customer_reviews.title: Serves the Purpose but could be improved to be more user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Night light is needed to be manually switched on and the switch is not visible in the night. Could be improved to be automatically switched on when the lid is lifted.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Greatest toilet seat of all time!
customer_reviews.text: Now I can go to the royal throne without freezing my royal *** off. This toilet seat is fantastic. I never knew life could be so good. It is warm on those cold winter nights. It has 3 settings for heat, medium seems to be all we need. A blue light for when it's dark so you don't miss. And very easy to connect to the toilet without tools. If you want to tighten it a little extra some pliers will do. If you've never had a heated toilet seat do yourself a favor and order now. Bemis is our go to brand for toilet seats they make the Rolls-Royce of toilet seats.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: I’m obsessed. You will be too
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to wait until I fully had time to use this product before writing a review. I absolutely LOVE these seats. Purchased 2 of them and they have 3 different temperature settings. During the brutal winter in Chicago... the highest setting was an absolute savior. It was so warm and comforting you didn’t freeze while trying to pee. The added nightlight is MY FAVORITE FEATURE. in the middle of the night when you don’t want to blind yourself by turning on lights, this cool blue led built in nightlight easily guides you to the toilet and isn’t too annoyingly bright. Would purchase more if I had More toilets in the house but I don’t. I’m obsessed with these though.
customer_reviews.author: Aprilia

customer_reviews.title: I live in maine
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom doesn't have a heater so the toilet seat gets cold even with the door open. This product works great, but the cord isn't the longest. Electrical isn't something people normally want near a toilet, so getting power to it might prove difficult. If need be, you can always find a local electrician to make an outlet appear close enough and still be safe for the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bolduc Builders

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more pleased. We rent, and unfortunately I can't take it upon myself to repair our landlords mistakes. The bathroom has no register, with marble floors. Year round it's as cold as can be. Not pleasant for utilizing the bathroom. This seat is an excellent alternative, also working out freqently it helps aleviate the tension in the lower back, plus assiting with sciatica. More than just a warm toilet seat. Also the little one stopped using the training potty, and started using the big potty. That's clearly the warm seat !! App around excellent device. Great mounting hardware and adjustment ability.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: No butts about it
customer_reviews.text: No butts about it, this seat is the sh@! Piece of cake to install. It was harder to get the old seat off than putting this one on. Very simple. I have to say that it is more comfy than the Kohler seat. Heats up almost instantly. We do not keep the heat on, so whenever you feel the need to go, hit the button and in seconds you, and it,are good to go. Fantastic slow closing lid. Seems like very good quality. Can’t wait for the cold winters and a warm tush.
customer_reviews.author: PABLOMAN

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how amazing a heated toilet seat is.. My boyfriend was very skeptical of me paying over $100 for a toilet seat but now he loves it as much as I do. Super easy to install. 3 heat settings (which I'm telling you know- high is very hot!) and I love the built in light to use at night. The only thing I would say that's not amazing is that if you have a bony behind, after sitting on it for a few minutes- it will not be as comfy.. BUT- I am used to having a padded seat- so maybe it just takes getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Kim J

customer_reviews.title: Uncentered
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this seat is comfortable. Except for the location of the plug. It's on the left. The wall receptacle is to the right of the commode. So to plug the product in, the cord has to circle around the back of the commode which is... kinda dumb. If the plug had been centered at the rear of the seat (with a channel to direct it left or right, as there is on a separate bidet seat we have), installation would have been far more logical.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Altschuler

customer_reviews.title: The Most Perfect Gift ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't know I was buying the MOST PERFECT GIFT EVER but I did. My wife loves me just a little bit more now. :-) This was easy to install, looks to be built pretty tough, and works like a dream. The blue bowl light is cool, and the seat is warm. She really likes the slow close too! Can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: FallingUpInOKC

customer_reviews.title: Nice indulgence!
customer_reviews.text: So very nice in the winter!!! Heats well, but would like a blue light instead of red. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: bstitch

customer_reviews.title: Died and went to heaven!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this heated toilet seat!! Living on Long Island, Winters are very cold. Sitting on a heated toilet seat may sound a bit frivolous but let me tell you...I feel like I died and went to heaven. It's amazing how good it feels to not put your bottom on an ice cold toilet seat!! Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have an updated toilet, it doesn’t fit much older toilets.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the seat was to go on an old round toilet and none of these would fit. We had to send it back, we didn’t have any problems with the return. I would recommend this seat!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toilet seat ever! We installed this in our bathroom in our basement bathroom that we recently finished. Sometimes I make a point to use that bathroom because of the heated toilet seat. We don’t have duct work in that bathroom so this works perfect! Love the night light as well!
customer_reviews.author: TR1010

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! If you can afford it, send it to someone as a gift. They will love you for it. It was easy to install, and the light is too cool. It warms up fast, and the settings are perfect. There are no seams to collect bacteria, and it is easy to clean. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: writer916

customer_reviews.title: cant live without it.
customer_reviews.text: ordered the first lid. The blue light did not work (guest bathroom, light was big selling point). 2nd one arrived the next day. went through amazon, return the first on to a local store no hassle no charge return. Unit works great and the super cold toilet is now warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No parts with the item.
customer_reviews.text: I order 4 of the heating toilet seats 3 work awesome only 1 out of the 4 came without parts I attend on reordering when I receive confirmation I received a refund, tried to order the parts for it but got the wrong parts sent to us. so we will try this again. love the product! thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: wendy marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Buy one for each of your bathrooms!
customer_reviews.text: Liked this toilet seat enough to buy a couple for my other bathrooms and for my parents home. Comfortable curved seat with blue nightlight which isn’t too bright. The 3 heat options for the seat make it functional in all circumstances. Originally bought for a gag gift for Christmas for my husband , and it has become a conversation piece when guests use the bathrooms. Everyone should have a seat like this!
customer_reviews.author: Bubaly

customer_reviews.title: Too short
customer_reviews.text: I really like the heat feature. Works fine. I am unhappy that the seat does not fit the bowl. It is nearly an inch short of covering the bowl leaving an inch of the bowl that is cold on the back of ones legs. Precision fit no way.
customer_reviews.author: patriots

customer_reviews.title: A nice, neat product
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to replace an old heated seat from a competitor. This one has a much cleaner look and warms up evenly than the other company's product, it was worth paying a little more. Other nice part was that the cord is just a cord (through it could have been twice longer), I don't need to have a giant converter at the end. It looks much safer to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tao October

customer_reviews.title: Wife reports “Best Gift Yet”.
customer_reviews.text: Believe it or not, I bought this as a Valentines Day gift for my wife. She has reported this has been my best gift to her. Warm, comfortable and conveniently night lit.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Weiss

customer_reviews.title: mark the voltage clearly
customer_reviews.text: I afraid I never had a chance to test its efficiency, as I ruinef it by attaching it to this country's 200 voltage PERHAPS THE VOLTAGE COULD BE PROMINENTLY DISPLAYED ON THE PRODUCT - THAT WOULD HAVE PREVENTED MY FIASCO. The product itself looked attractive. I am sorry I had to discard it as a winter aid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best toilet seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat. It requires an outlet but very easy to install. It has a great night light feature and the heat is great? Is my 2nd one in my house?
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Better than described. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Installed very easily. Has a solid feel. Seat temperature very comfortable. Love the nightlight feature. Better than described.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Katz

customer_reviews.title: Slightly smaller center opening that we liked
customer_reviews.text: I have a Toto heated seat that has a larger opening in the center. It is ok for women, but men might feel that it could be more roomy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Britt

customer_reviews.title: lets my wife use the toilet without getting shivering cold!
customer_reviews.text: quick and easy to install. one of the hinge bolts worked loose but nothing broke, just a quick re-install. best bathroom purchase ever for my wife. just remember to restart after power shuts off. it is not an auto-restart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wife loves it.
customer_reviews.text: works like advertised. easy install. good hold down bolts. been using all winter. don't need the high sitting.
customer_reviews.author: John Engelbert

customer_reviews.title: Dosent get hot enough
customer_reviews.text: It dosent seem to work at -40 won't heat up and it dosent work on a switch have to manually turn it on each time
customer_reviews.author: Masterblaster

customer_reviews.title: hottest setting is not that hot
customer_reviews.text: 4 Stars because the hottest setting is not that hot. Other wise easy to install and adjust. Works great. No more cold seats.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.text: Love these great addition to your home if you have a plug by your toilet adds an expensive touch to your home no regrets people talk about our heated seats all the time if you are looking for a wow factor this is it!
customer_reviews.author: douglas s hornberger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heated seat.
customer_reviews.text: Love this heated toilet seat. Has 3 choices of heating level and soft blue night light.
customer_reviews.author: V. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the women in your life this winter
customer_reviews.text: Sitting down on a cold toilet seat during the winter is a thrilling experience. This heated toilet seat makes it a pleasant one. Your wife will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hallow Knight

customer_reviews.title: Short cord about 3ft
customer_reviews.text: Don't use the light but it's so comfortable on its lowest setting I don't why everybathroom doesn't have this
customer_reviews.author: jeffro b

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing like warm toilet seat!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best purchase I have ever made! No more brrr when I get that call of nature in the middle of the night. It was super easy to install and works like a dream come true. I guarantee that you will be as pleased as I have been with the Bemis Radiance toilet seat. I wish I had bought mine years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Scooter Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!
customer_reviews.text: What an invention! Should’ve purchased this years ago! Love the heat..
customer_reviews.author: Luve

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to your bathroom on these wintry days!
customer_reviews.text: A great solution to cold bathrooms especially in the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: retired educator

customer_reviews.title: Great product, can’t say enough
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product. My wife wondered why we waited so long.
customer_reviews.author: brian h

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for the upcoming cold weather!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works well over the past month. Now, will not be awakened by a freezing toilet seat at night!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect I just wanted comfort. Very sleek and so easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved
customer_reviews.text: The best hundred and some dollars I have ever spent. Nothing and nose me worse than a cold toilet seat. With this problem no worries you're home free.
customer_reviews.author: gary scott

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: Measure and remeasure your space. Theirs seemed a bit off. I sent it back. Impossible to fit. Leave plenty of space on the top of the seat. Sizing way off in person.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect bathroom accessory
customer_reviews.text: It made everyone happy, and I became an instant hero.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: fast heat to saet
customer_reviews.text: very good deal, quality , easy and handy to use !
customer_reviews.author: M. C

customer_reviews.title: We love our heated seat!
customer_reviews.text: We had one in our previous motorhome and just had to buy another for our new motorhome! You don’t truly realize how awesome this heated seat is until you don’t have it! Love the light...serves well as a nightlight. Heat settings are divine :-)
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Wagner Butler

customer_reviews.title: A winter must
customer_reviews.text: When it was 19 degrees outside and we were not heating the whole house, this was a wonderful way to add comfort a cold bathroom visit!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, it is what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! ! No more sitting on a cold toilet seat.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm seat!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should have a heated toilet seat, makes going to bathroom on cold nights a lot more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: jack & harry mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, easy to install and my wife enjoys not having to sit on a cold seat anymore.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm in winter
customer_reviews.text: I have a cold bathroom, and this gem did the trick. Love it. You will too. Easy to install, and you’ll be glad you did every time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Snyderdf

customer_reviews.title: Warm your bummie.
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't used this seat your missing out. This is so much better than sitting on a cold seat in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: steven dessert

customer_reviews.title: Everyone loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Easy install. Everyone likes a warm seat and the blue light acts as a night light. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this seat. So easy to install. Looks great and heats nicely. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Harpreet Nagra

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: Love the warmth. It’s the little things and the light is Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This was the gift my husband wanted and I surprised him with it and he is wowed by the product. Even our gusts make compliments.
customer_reviews.author: steph

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one I have purchased. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I live in a high elevation and when the temperature drops the seat works!
customer_reviews.author: J. Benson

customer_reviews.title: I love this item
customer_reviews.text: I love this toilet seat, I am regret that I didn’t use it by those past years. I just got it couple days ago, I treat it as my enjoyment when I sit down on this warm seat.
customer_reviews.author: Jane qing Chang

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat... fits better than any other warm seat I have bought in the past...
customer_reviews.author: Pat McFarlandl

customer_reviews.title: The warmer is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Seat warmer is fantastic, but the night light is not noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great seat...
customer_reviews.text: Loving it so far... only problem is getting electricity to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: everybody loves this seat when they sit on it--we have 2 and are going to buy a 3rd
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this toilet seat buying another for my other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Peller

customer_reviews.title: Extremely good product
customer_reviews.text: It was a good product easy to install easy to clean I have no complaints about this product
customer_reviews.author: Jerry matejka

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works as expected and i will never go without a heated seat again!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Losinski

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Kept the chill off, all winter long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love the heated seat. No more Shocking cold seat in the middle of the night
customer_reviews.author: Bertha Rogers

product_meta.title: BEMIS Radiance Heated Night Light Toilet Seat will Slow Close and Never Loosen, ELONGATED, Long Lasting Plastic, White, H1900NL 000
product_meta.description:
Color:Elongated - WhiteELG CFWC PLST HEATED ST

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Bemis – Bemis toilet seats bring quality, innovation and style to residential and commercial properties worldwide. Bemis toilet seats provide a wide variety of designs to easily integrate into any bathroom. The needs of residential and commercial customers are at the forefront of design with unmatched features and benefits that make everyday lives easier. 

Bemis Manufacturing Company is the world’s largest manufacturer of toilet seats. Founded in 1901, and in the fourth generation of family ownership, Bemis has grown from a maker of furniture and wooden wagons to an international enterprise with manufacturing and warehousing facilities worldwide. In addition to manufacturing toilet seats, Bemis is one of North America’s top non-automotive producers of contract plastic injection-molded components. With a continued commitment to the worldwide community, Bemis Manufacturing Company strives to set the standard for ecological responsibility, conservation and preservation.
feature_bullets: 3 SETTINGS: Multi-setting warming Seat with 3 temperature settings for comfort
SOFT ILLUMINATION: Built-in blue LED night light that illuminates the bathroon with a soft, soothing glow
NO SLAMMING: Seat closes slowly and quietly with a tap to eliminate pinched fingers
NO MORE WIGGLE: With the STA-TITE fastening System your Seat will never come loose
PERFECT FIT: Precision Seat Fit has front to back adjustability for the perfect Seat to toilet bowl fit
MORE STABILITY: Super Grip Bumpers prevent the Seat from shifting on the toilet bowl
POWER CONNECTION: Powered by standard GFCI wall outlet
INSTALLS WITH A SNAP: The STA-TITE Seat Fastening System is easy to install with just a wrench
FITS ALL ELONGATED TOILETS: Including Kohler, American Standard, TOTO and many more

specifications.Warranty Description: Manufacturer warranty covers US and Canada customer purchases
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars160 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
